name: Grave Behemoth
description: The Grave Behemoth is a massive undead creature, characterized by its decaying flesh and imposing presence, making it a terrifying sight on the battlefield.
memorable: It can summon additional zombies and commands them directly, creating a swarm effect that overwhelms foes.
goals: Typically aims to destroy living foes while commanding an undead horde.
relations: Often encountered with a legion of zombies it creates and controls.
environment: Commonly found in graveyards, ruins, or places tainted by necromancy.
strengths: Remarkable durability with high hit points and the ability to create and command zombies.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to nimble and ranged attacks.
attacks: Can deliver devastating melee attacks with its slam and gorge actions, capable of dealing significant bludgeoning and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Hurl Flesh ability allows it to vomit putrid flesh, damaging enemies in a cone while summoning more zombies.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against turning effects.
Loses limbs impairing its combat effectiveness.
Creates zombies when it takes damage.
Zombies created by it are immune to necrotic damage.
Large area of effect attack with necrotic damage.
test_queries: creature that vomits flesh and summons zombies
monster with high hit points and melee strength
undead creature with abilities to create minions
